lines.text: I've been thinking things over for some time now, and I'll be happy to make you my wife. Then no one could speak ill of you.
But no one speaks ill of me now!
Aren't you afraid of anything, Concha? Have you no fear of death?
No. Not today. I feel too happy. Why do you ask? Are you going to kill me?
You're a very beautiful woman. It's easy to see why men should lose their heads over you.
Listen to me, Pasqualito. You never loved me or you couldn't do this.
You know very well that I loved you.
You've always mistaken your vanity for love. It's your final mistake. Go and kill the only man I ever cared for.
If you catch a man stealing, shoot him. Less trouble afterwards.
Mother says no flies enter a closed mouth.
How I worry when I see my daughter leave in the morning.
How can you say that, Mother, when you sleep all day?
Lie some more. You lie so well.
